articles.title: SNL takes on Derek Chauvin trial in its cold open - Vox.com
articles.description: The opening sketch pokes fun at white Americans’ optimism about Chauvin trial outcome.
articles.content: Hes a white cop in Minnesota so Im going to guess probation with pay, tops.
